#To view GAV loads of all families using ggplot2
```{r}
library(tidyverse) ## Do this everytime you restart R and need it
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
fams20160204 <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cheryltky/ViralTransmission/master/Working%20Files/201602_04_10fams_26112019.csv")
head(fams20160204)
summary(fams20160204)
str(fams20160204)
```

# Make PrawnID, Class, Age, FamID , IntFamID as factors

```{r}
fams20160204 <- fams20160204 %>% mutate_if(is.character, as.factor)
fams20160204$IntFamID <- as.factor(fams20160204$IntFamID)
fams20160204$PrawnID <- as.factor(fams20160204$PrawnID)
fams20160204$Class <- as.factor(fams20160204$Class)
fams20160204$Age <- as.factor(fams20160204$Age)
fams20160204$Code<- as.factor(fams20160204$Code)
fams20160204$Cohort <- as.factor(fams20160204$Cohort)
str(fams20160204)
summary(fams20160204)
```

##Scatterplot by families
```{r}
ggplot(fams20160204 , aes(IntFamID , GAV)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_classic()
```

##boxplot by families
```{r}
ggplot(fams20160204 , aes(IntFamID , GAV)) +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.2) +
  aes(color = Class , shape = Class ) +
  labs( title = "Cohort 20160204: Top 10 families GAV loads")

toptenfams <- ggplot(fams20160204 , aes(IntFamID , GAV)) +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.2) +
  aes(color = Class , shape = Class ) +
  labs( title = "Top 10 Families GAV Loads",
        x = "Family" , 
        y = "GAV RNA copies/ug TNA")


ggsave("2016020410famplots.png" , toptenfams , width = 15, height = 10 , dpi = 300)
```
